Articles.Content:
Hey

I would like some additional flags/logos for my mods - it seems wasteful to just have a whole folder and just have one flag in it. I'd especially like a Logo-type flag for Tiberdyne (or Tiberdyne Aerospace ) and a two or three-color Novapunch 'meatball' flag.

*cuttycutcut*

Took a while but here a first try...

Nice, I like them, would probably stick all 4 in the flags folder.

Only adjustment would be shrinking the shuttle and logo on 1 and 2 so it doesn't sit on top of the text

Hi

I would like a flag featuring some sort of stylized atom in orbit around Kerbin (only a small section of Kerbin visible, so it looks larger) and the word Career writ big along the bottom. The atom should ideally look something like this.

If it isn't too much of a problem, I would like a similar one with a stylized kerbal on EVA in a similar situation. The word Career Should be replaced by Sandbox.
Here you are.

Alright, perfect. Thanks again

Would still like a Novapunch logo if anyone is interested

If anyone wants to make the Strong Badian Administration of Some Aluminum Foil like I did, here's a Strong Badian flag I threw together.

Come to.... the place where the tropical breezes flow!
thanks....

If you're still taking requests for flags, I'd very much like this one if you could make it:

Blue background, green circle (as in ring rather than dot) in the centre with 12 smaller green circles (will probably need to be dots) arranged around it. Six thin white bars coming in from the edges and intersecting in the middle, so that each bar bisects a pair of the smaller circles.

Don't know how well that will work when reduced to flag size but I'd love to see if it does.

Thanks!
Hi, may I please have a flag with the 1980s NASA style with the open A's but written KNSA?
Are you still taking requests for flags? I just want to know before asking.
yea u can ask

Could I please request the Arstostkan Flag, but in the bird's claws holding a hammer and sickle.

You can choose in which order, or if any other objects in it's claws would be better.

Thanks
As you didn't tell me about the colors here 3 variants:

As you didn't tell me about the colors here 3 variants:

Ah, sorry. I'm rather foolizh. The first and second ones seem best to me. Thanks!

Hi

I would like a flag featuring some sort of stylized atom in orbit around Kerbin (only a small section of Kerbin visible, so it looks larger) and the word Career writ big along the bottom. The atom should ideally look something like this.

If it isn't too much of a problem, I would like a similar one with a stylized kerbal on EVA in a similar situation. The word Career Should be replaced by Sandbox.

Uh, Just to clarify, Is anyone willing to do this?

If you're still taking requests for flags, I'd very much like this one if you could make it:

Blue background, green circle (as in ring rather than dot) in the centre with 12 smaller green circles (will probably need to be dots) arranged around it. Six thin white bars coming in from the edges and intersecting in the middle, so that each bar bisects a pair of the smaller circles.

Don't know how well that will work when reduced to flag size but I'd love to see if it does.

Thanks!

made something...still... not sure...

Uh, Just to clarify, Is anyone willing to do this?

Yeah, but not today. I should have made yours - first in first out... sorry for that Not much time for KSP & Flags atm...

Edited October 28, 2013 by MadHorse

made something...still... not sure...

Yeah, but not today. I should have made yours - first in first out... sorry for that Not much time for KSP & Flags atm...

Hmm, me neither It's exactly what I asked for though so that's no fault of yours! I think it might work better with a slightly thicker central ring and dots rather than circles around the edge. Same size I think, just filled in.

Great work though - thanks! If you get a moment, an edit would be lovely but as you said - first in first out, so I appreciate that edits are probably not at the top of the queue.

Edited October 28, 2013 by KSK
This deserves a BUMP
how do you guys like this im planning on putting it on a shirt

Hmm, me neither It's exactly what I asked for though so that's no fault of yours! I think it might work better with a slightly thicker central ring and dots rather than circles around the edge. Same size I think, just filled in.

Great work though - thanks! If you get a moment, an edit would be lovely but as you said - first in first out, so I appreciate that edits are probably not at the top of the queue.

Hi

I would like a flag featuring some sort of stylized atom in orbit around Kerbin (only a small section of Kerbin visible, so it looks larger) and the word Career writ big along the bottom.*snip*

If it isn't too much of a problem, I would like a similar one with a stylized kerbal on EVA in a similar situation. The word Career Should be replaced by Sandbox.

Could I please request the Arstostkan Flag, but in the bird's claws holding a hammer and sickle.

You can choose in which order, or if any other objects in it's claws would be better.

Thanks

Needed to stretch the claws a bit.

Needed to stretch the claws a bit.

flip the sickle around, so it points up, it'll look better
I would like a flag with All of the planets on it, with the sun in the middle

flip the sickle around, so it points up, it'll look better
Yeah I'd agree, but apart from that it looks great!
